messages.title: Here's three good reasons to back James
More and more people are backing James Flanagan

keyPolicies.policyDescription: James campaigned tirelessly to keep Britain in the EU. Like most people in Canterbury, he voted Remain in the referendum. He believes people should have their say on the final terms of the Brexit deal. Electing James Flanagan as our new MP will send a strong message to the Conservative Government against a disastrous hard Brexit.

James will be a champion for local health and social care services. With our NHS under threat from further Conservative cuts, we need an MP who will safeguard vital funding and fight for our hospital.

The government is cutting school budgets in Canterbury by more than £5m/year by 2019. We need to invest nearly £7b, reverse cuts to frontline school and college budgets, properly fund pupil funding in real terms and ensure no school loses out from the National Funding Formula.
